All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Home
    The home screen.
    Info
    The about/info screen.
    LearnRhythm
    Easy-level learning materials for the rhythm topic.
    LearnScales
    Easy-level learning materials for the scales topic.
    LearnScalesMedium
    Medium-level learning materials for the scales topic.
    QuestionsBank
    The bank of questions to be used in the quiz activity.
    QuestionsList
    The structure and layout for questions in the quiz activity.
    QuestionsListImages
    The structure and layout for image-based questions in the quiz activity.
    QuizActivity
    The quiz activity.
    QuizResults
    The quiz results screen.
    QuizRhythm
    The screen where the user can select a difficulty and start a rhythm quiz.
    QuizScales
    The screen where the user can select a difficulty and start a scales quiz.
    QuizSelect
    The screen where the user can select a topic to take a quiz on.
    SetGoals
    The screen where the user can select how many days per week they would like to take a quiz.
    SetName
    The screen where the user can set their name to be shown elsewhere in the app.
    Stats
    The screen where the user can view their stats.
    Topics
    The screen where the user can select a topic to learn about.
    Welcome
    The welcome screen.
